title: Ch4 Polynomials - Advanced Challenge
subtitle: Special Products Mastery and Complex Multi-Step Problems
description: 28 challenging questions focusing on the hardest polynomial concepts - test your mastery!
skills: Complex special products with multi-variable terms

questions.question: Multiply: (3x² - 5y³)²
questions.explanation: Correct! Using (A - B)² = A² - 2AB + B²: (3x²)² - 2(3x²)(5y³) + (5y³)² = 9x⁴ - 30x²y³ + 25y⁶.

review.info: Square each term and don't forget the middle term: -2AB

questions.question: Multiply: (4a²b³ + 7c⁴)(4a²b³ - 7c⁴)
questions.explanation: Correct! Using (A + B)(A - B) = A² - B²: (4a²b³)² - (7c⁴)² = 16a⁴b⁶ - 49c⁸. Remember to square all exponents!

review.info: Difference of squares with multi-variable terms

questions.question: Multiply: (2x³y² - 3xy⁴)²
questions.explanation: Correct! (A - B)² = A² - 2AB + B²: (2x³y²)² - 2(2x³y²)(3xy⁴) + (3xy⁴)² = 4x⁶y⁴ - 12x⁴y⁶ + 9x²y⁸.

review.info: Add exponents carefully when squaring multi-variable terms

questions.question: Multiply: (5m²n + 6p³)(5m²n - 6p³)
questions.explanation: Correct! (A + B)(A - B) = A² - B²: (5m²n)² - (6p³)² = 25m⁴n² - 36p⁶.

review.info: Difference of squares: square the coefficients AND double the exponents

questions.question: Expand: [(x + 2) - 3y]²
questions.explanation: Correct! Let A = (x + 2) and B = 3y. Then (A - B)² = A² - 2AB + B² = (x + 2)² - 2(x + 2)(3y) + (3y)². Expand each: x² + 4x + 4 - 6xy - 12y + 9y².

review.info: Nested binomials: treat entire expression as one term, then expand

questions.question: Multiply: (a³ + b²)²
questions.explanation: Correct! (A + B)² = A² + 2AB + B²: (a³)² + 2(a³)(b²) + (b²)² = a⁶ + 2a³b² + b⁴.

review.info: When squaring terms with exponents, multiply the exponents: (a³)² = a⁶

questions.question: Multiply: (7xy² - 2z³)(7xy² + 2z³)
questions.explanation: Correct! (A - B)(A + B) = A² - B²: (7xy²)² - (2z³)² = 49x²y⁴ - 4z⁶.

review.info: Difference of squares works with any expressions, including multi-variable

questions.question: Expand: (x²y - z)²
questions.explanation: Correct! (A - B)² = A² - 2AB + B²: (x²y)² - 2(x²y)(z) + z² = x⁴y² - 2x²yz + z².

review.info: Square binomials carefully with variable terms

questions.question: Multiply: (3a + 4b²)(3a - 4b²)
questions.explanation: Correct! (A + B)(A - B) = A² - B²: (3a)² - (4b²)² = 9a² - 16b⁴.

review.info: Square the coefficient and double the exponent of variables

questions.question: Expand: (5x³ - y²)²
questions.explanation: Correct! (A - B)² = A² - 2AB + B²: (5x³)² - 2(5x³)(y²) + (y²)² = 25x⁶ - 10x³y² + y⁴.

review.info: Middle term coefficient: 2 × 5 × 1 = 10

questions.question: Multiply: (2m³n² + 5)(2m³n² - 5)
questions.explanation: Correct! (A + B)(A - B) = A² - B²: (2m³n²)² - 5² = 4m⁶n⁴ - 25.

review.info: Constant terms also get squared in difference of squares

questions.question: Expand: (6ab² - c³d)²
questions.explanation: Correct! (A - B)² = A² - 2AB + B²: (6ab²)² - 2(6ab²)(c³d) + (c³d)² = 36a²b⁴ - 12ab²c³d + c⁶d².

review.info: Complex multi-variable terms require careful exponent handling

questions.question: Simplify: (2x + 3)(x - 5) + (x - 1)²
questions.explanation: Correct! First: (2x + 3)(x - 5) = 2x² - 10x + 3x - 15 = 2x² - 7x - 15. Second: (x - 1)² = x² - 2x + 1. Add: 2x² - 7x - 15 + x² - 2x + 1 = 3x² - 9x - 14. Wait, let me recalculate: -15 + 1 = -14, not 16. The answer should be 3x² - 9x - 14.

review.info: Expand each product separately, then combine like terms

questions.question: Expand and simplify: (x + 2)² - (x - 3)(x + 3)
questions.explanation: Correct! First: (x + 2)² = x² + 4x + 4. Second: (x - 3)(x + 3) = x² - 9. Subtract: x² + 4x + 4 - (x² - 9) = x² + 4x + 4 - x² + 9 = 4x + 13.

review.info: Distribute the negative sign when subtracting: -(x² - 9) = -x² + 9

questions.question: Multiply: (x + 1)(x - 1)(x + 2)
questions.explanation: Correct! First multiply (x + 1)(x - 1) = x² - 1. Then multiply (x² - 1)(x + 2) = x³ + 2x² - x - 2.

review.info: Multiply two binomials first, then multiply result by third

questions.question: Expand: (a + b)(a - b)(a² + b²)
questions.explanation: Correct! First: (a + b)(a - b) = a² - b². Then: (a² - b²)(a² + b²) = (a²)² - (b²)² = a⁴ - b⁴. This uses difference of squares twice!

review.info: Applying difference of squares formula twice creates a⁴ - b⁴

questions.question: Simplify: 3(x + 2)² - 2(x - 1)²
questions.explanation: Correct! First: 3(x + 2)² = 3(x² + 4x + 4) = 3x² + 12x + 12. Second: 2(x - 1)² = 2(x² - 2x + 1) = 2x² - 4x + 2. Subtract: 3x² + 12x + 12 - 2x² + 4x - 2 = x² + 16x + 10.

review.info: Distribute coefficients after expanding binomial squares

questions.question: Multiply: (½x + ⅔y)²
questions.explanation: Correct! (A + B)² = A² + 2AB + B²: (½x)² + 2(½x)(⅔y) + (⅔y)² = ¼x² + ⅔xy + 4/9·y².

review.info: Fraction coefficients: (½)² = ¼, (⅔)² = 4/9, 2·½·⅔ = ⅔
Decimal coefficients: multiply carefully and combine like terms

questions.question: Expand: (¾x² - ⅓y)²
questions.explanation: Correct! (A - B)² = A² - 2AB + B²: (¾x²)² - 2(¾x²)(⅓y) + (⅓y)² = 9/16·x⁴ - ½x²y + 1/9·y². Middle: 2·¾·⅓ = 6/12 = ½.

review.info: Fraction arithmetic: (¾)² = 9/16, (⅓)² = 1/9

questions.question: Multiply: (-3x² - 4xy)(- 2x + 5y)
questions.explanation: Correct! Distribute: (-3x²)(-2x) + (-3x²)(5y) + (-4xy)(-2x) + (-4xy)(5y) = 6x³ - 15x²y + 8x²y - 20xy² = 6x³ - 7x²y - 20xy². Watch the signs carefully!

review.info: Negative signs: (-)(−) = +, (-)(+) = −

questions.question: Multiply: (-½a + ⅔b)(-½a - ⅔b)
questions.explanation: Correct! This is (A + B)(A - B) where A = -½a and B = -⅔b. Wait, actually it's (-½a + ⅔b)(-½a - ⅔b). Let me rewrite: [(-½a) + ⅔b][(-½a) - ⅔b]. This is NOT quite difference of squares form. Let me use FOIL: (-½a)(-½a) + (-½a)(-⅔b) + (⅔b)(-½a) + (⅔b)(-⅔b) = ¼a² + ⅓ab - ⅓ab - 4/9·b² = ¼a² - 4/9·b². Actually it simplifies to difference of squares!

review.info: Can be done with FOIL or recognizing as (A + B)(A - B) form

questions.question: Expand: (2x²y - 3xy² + z)(xy - 2z)
questions.explanation: Correct! Multiply each term of first polynomial by each term of second: 2x²y·xy - 2x²y·2z - 3xy²·xy + 3xy²·2z + z·xy - z·2z = 2x³y² - 4x²yz - 3x²y³ + 6xy²z + xyz - 2z².

review.info: Trinomial × binomial: 6 products total, combine like terms if any

questions.question: Multiply: (4x²y - 3xy + 4y)(xy + 3y)
questions.explanation: Correct! Distribute: 4x²y·xy + 4x²y·3y - 3xy·xy - 3xy·3y + 4y·xy + 4y·3y = 4x³y² + 12x²y² - 3x²y² - 9xy² + 4xy² + 12y². Combine like terms: 4x³y² + 9x²y² - 5xy² + 12y².

review.info: From ch4.md example: multiply trinomial by binomial

questions.question: Which is the correct expansion of (3a - 2b)²?
questions.explanation: Correct! (A - B)² = A² - 2AB + B²: (3a)² - 2(3a)(2b) + (2b)² = 9a² - 12ab + 4b². A common error is forgetting the middle term or getting the sign wrong.

review.info: Common error: (A - B)² ≠ A² - B² (you must include -2AB)

questions.question: A student claims (x + 5)² = x² + 25. What is the correct answer and error?
options: Correct answer is x² + 10x + 25; error: forgot middle term 2AB
Correct answer is x² + 5x + 25; error: wrong middle term
Correct answer is x² + 10x + 10; error: wrong last term
questions.explanation: Correct! (x + 5)² = x² + 2(x)(5) + 25 = x² + 10x + 25. The most common error is forgetting the middle term (2AB). The student incorrectly thought (A + B)² = A² + B².

review.info: Most common error: forgetting the middle term in (A + B)²

questions.question: Identify the error: (2x - 3y)² = 4x² - 9y². What should it be?
questions.explanation: Correct! The student incorrectly used difference of squares formula instead of square of binomial. (2x - 3y)² = (2x)² - 2(2x)(3y) + (3y)² = 4x² - 12xy + 9y².

review.info: Don't confuse (A - B)² with (A + B)(A - B)

questions.question: Multiply: (5x³ + 4x)(2x² - 1)
questions.explanation: Correct! Distribute: 5x³·2x² + 5x³·(-1) + 4x·2x² + 4x·(-1) = 10x⁵ - 5x³ + 8x³ - 4x = 10x⁵ + 3x³ - 4x.

review.info: From ch4.md self-study examples: FOIL with different exponents
